Night is young ❤️

Dedicated for those who adore simplicity

Posted Dec 27, 2020

Senasennam ma

Ra ahase tharu thibunata, na eliyak e handa waage. Jeewithayata monawa thibunada, na kisiwak numba waage.

Senasennam ma... numba langa nam hema mohothema, Handuna gannata, jeewithayama, Saralai nam ma... numba ha gewana kalaya, Senehasa winda ipilei sitha....

Paata ithirena dedunnaka heda, Paawena sulange yan na bondawi, Lokaya gena oba dakina hitha, Paata paata dedunnak waagei. Senasennam ma... numba langa nam Hema mohothema, Handuna gannata, jeewithayama, Saralai nam ma... numba ha gewana kalaya, Senehasa winda ipilei sitha...

Saralai nam ma... numba ha gewana kalaya, Senehasa winda ipilei sitha... Sanasennam ma......
